## How to manage permissions of different user roles?

Alex is the LMS admin in an organisation and he has been assigned as the
application admin of Curricula. He wants to refine permissions of user roles.
Curricula allows Alex to edit permissions of the following roles:

• Course admin

• Programme admin

• Course manager & co-course manager

• Class owner

• Trainer

• Marker

Let’s see how Alex will manage permissions.

1\. In Curricula, Alex clicks **Admin** on the left navigation pane, and then
clicks **Role management**.

2\. Roles at different levels are displayed in the corresponding tabs. Alex
hovers his mouse over the row of a role and clicks the Edit button.

3\. In the **Permissions** section, he can assign or remove permissions.

4\. When Alex finishes the changes, he clicks **Save**.

***Note** : If Alex wants to view different user roles and corresponding
permissions, he can click **Export**.

5\. He clicks the Job monitor icon in the upper-right corner to view the
export process.

6\. When the export job status is updated to **Successful** , Alex selects the
job, and then clicks **Download**. The report package will be downloaded to
his local device.
